@goldsborough is it really the plan to force people to use .parameters()? It doesn't seem to scale to larger networks. It's quite common to do things like

resnet.block1.subblock4.conv3.weight.uniform_()

but it's almost impossible to figure out which index to look up from .parameters() to get there.
body:
@goldsborough is it really the plan to force people to use `.parameters()`? It doesn't seem to scale to larger networks. It's quite common to do things like
```python3
resnet.block1.subblock4.conv3.weight.uniform_()
```
but it's almost impossible to figure out which index to look up from `.parameters()` to get there.
